titles.title: Alas And Did My Savior Bleed

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Alas, and did my Savior bleed newline And did my Sovereign die? newline Would He devote that sacred head, newline For such a worm as I.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Was it for crimes that I have done, newline He suffered on the tree? newline Amazing pity, grace unknown, newline And love beyond degree!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Well might the sun in darkness hide newline And shut His glories in; newline When Christ the mighty Maker died newline For man, the creature's sin.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thus might I hide my blushing face newline While His dear cross appears; newline Dissolve my heart in thankfulness newline And melt mine eyes to tears.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: But drops of grief can ne'er repay, newline The debt of love I owe; newline Here, Lord, I give myself away, newline 'Tis all that I can do.
